name: Teeny Tiny Delicate Thin Stacking Rings In 14K gold filled Diamond Faceted and Twisted Combo
description:
These are lovely and delicate stacking rings in 14K Gold filled. Two are faceted and one is twisted presenting a great play of light across the finishes. Sold in sets of 3 (ALL 3 ONE SIZE ONLY), these are the among the thinnest I make.

I now use pure 14K gold solder that eliminates any color difference or potential tarnishing at the solder join. I think you will agree with me that the join now is a perfect match with the ring.

I will make these to size in my studio, turn around is about 5 days as I produce and ship twice a week, and I try keep a stock of most standard sizes. All my jewelry comes boxed, ready to give and receive. Please make sure you tell me what size you want them in.

name: Peach Orange Crystal Raw Organic Crystal Solitaire Ring in Sterling Silver 5 1/2 US
description:
Crystal Persuasion 

Impressive Peach Raw Crystal hand forged ring. The 3/16 wide band that has been textured, lightly oxidized and given a satin finish. The band shows off the raw melon orange calcite gemstone crystal to perfection. The perfect urban accessory, my personal ring draws comments every time I wear it.

This ring is a US 5.5 and cannot be re-sized.  I might be able to stretch it a tad.

name: Unique Organic Floral Fine Silver Pendant on Hand Forged Sterling Silver Chain Toggle Clasp Flower
description:
Handmade PMC fine silver pendant on a hand forged sterling silver chain. All the links in the chain have been soldered for strength and durability and the toggle clasp was made especially for this piece. The design in the pendent started as a flower bud I wildcrafted, from which I made a mold and used for the texture. 

The texture has been brought out by oxidation giving it wonderful depth and character. The necklace measures about 21.5" overall. Ready to ship.

This piece was completely worked by me in my studio. The pendant measures about 1.50" high X .75" wide.

name: Hammered Copper & Sterling Silver Accented Fan Shell Semi Hoop Earrings
description:
Gorgeous handmade copper earrings. Flared open to look like blossoms opening on your ears revealing their secret treasure. Accented with Sterling Silver balls, these earring have a straight post in Sterling Silver with silicone earring nuts. I heat colored the copper and gave them a light coat of a brilliant heat set coating to preserve the color. These will not change or turn anything green.

The flares measure about 1.25" long and .75" overall. Hand crafted in my studio, these earrings are unique.

All my jewelry comes boxed ready to give and receive.

name: Fire Agate Pendant in Sterling Silver
description:
Wonderful fire agate set in rustic sterling silver. Hand crafted bezel set on a sterling back plate that has been oxidized and ornamented with a 4mm zirconia for a little sparkle. I texturized the back for interest and added wire swirls. The bail will comfortably hold a 3mm chain or cord. Ready to ship!

All my pendants come on a 2mm black satin necklace that slips over your head and adjusts from 16" to 20" long. This way you can wear it immediately or move it to your own chain as you desire.
